rules_text:
Flash
When Lafterii Elementalist enters, copy target instant or sorcery spell you control, then exile the original and put a time counter on it. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](At the beginning of its owner’s upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they may play it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
